description:
Intermittent Fasting is about learning how to optimize your results in the gym and increase fat loss by using the proper supplementation and nutrition protocol in order to achieve quick and efficient results.

Through this course you will learn:

-About Intermittent Fasting and what it does.

-Basic Nutrition that works well with a 7 day “IF” program

- Basic Training for optimal for a 7 day split with introduction to cardio acceleration.

-Basic food preparation with what to eat when, when to eat and how frequently you will be eating


There are no materials included; however, you may want to take down notes on how to create and personalize your meal and training plan.

This course gives you all the information you will need in less than 1 hour, which is great because our lives are on the go and when we want to shed fat we want to do it quick and efficiently. This course is structured for easy learning and gives your the most effective points and the model.

So, why take this course, might you ask. It's perfect for anyone looking to get exciting about their weight loss journey or their fitness journey. You will be provided with tools to use in order to amp your current program or jumpstart you with a new program!

It's recommended that you have a basic understanding of exercises for training or workouts plans.
title: Shed Fat Fast in 7 Days
